item.description:
Happy Thanksgiving week everyone! It's the biggest travel holiday in the US.
Just decided to have a Thanksgiving supper here on FRIDAY the day after Thanksgiving, for anyone who is in town and would like to get together for a casual supper and some traditional New England Thanksgiving food. Nothing fancy, but we'll try to have a couple good dishes!

This is not an English conversation meetup, just a gathering of friends for the holiday. (Chinese Meetup group and other friends have been invited)
item.how_to_find_us: Call me for directions or email. I will check up until the afternoon.

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: Friday supper- Thanksgiving gathering
